summary: Implements a graph convolution layer based on Chebyshev polynomial approximation of spectral filters, computing a normalized Laplacian, recursively generating Chebyshev basis vectors, and applying learnable weight matrices to produce transformed node features with optional bias and activation.
business_intent: Enable fast, localized spectral graph convolutions for deep learning models on irregular structures, reducing computational cost compared to full eigen‑decomposition while supporting flexible feature dimensions and non‑linearities.
